channel.title: [DELTA, 317] Quest Tab [DELTA, 317]
channel.description: Okay I Am More Of A PI Guy Sooo I Need Help With This Delta Lol, Where Do I Edit The Quest Tab? Can You Help Me What The Quest Tab Says And When You Click On What It Says It Does A Action. Can Someone Help? Please And Thank You. ;D

item.title: [DELTA, 317] Quest Tab [DELTA, 317]
item.dc:creator: @rova1 rova1
item.description:
@rova1 wrote:

okay, start at line 4 of your pastebin, above where it says: c.sendQuest("Abandoned Dreams! Highscores", 6399);

and add this:

c.sendQuest("Player Online [" + PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount() + "] ", 663); c.sendQuest("@yel@fill these in", 7332); c.sendQuest("@gre@however you want", 7333); c.sendQuest("@gre@it's not hard", 7334); c.sendQuest("@gre@find some guide", 7336); c.sendQuest("@gre@", 7383); c.sendQuest("@gre@", 7339); c.sendQuest("@gre@@", 7338); c.sendQuest(" ", 640); c.sendQuest(" ", 7340); c.sendQuest(" ", 7346); c.sendQuest(" ", 7341); c.sendQuest(" ", 7342); c.sendQuest(" ", 7337); c.sendQuest("i just copied", 7343); c.sendQuest("and wiped this", 7335); c.sendQuest("from a random", 7344); c.sendQuest("delta-based", 7345); c.sendQuest("source", 7347); c.sendQuest(" ", 7348);
fill in the bits between the 2 " like I showed. Remember, for the clickable options you would need to add that part into clickingmost - like the interface popping up or whatever. also note that stats like player count or pk points will not be real time - players would need to re-log for them to update- unless you add it to process() in client.java

sorry I can’t be bothered to help in too much detail but keep try its really basic stuff here

Read full topic

item.title: [DELTA, 317] Quest Tab [DELTA, 317]
item.dc:creator: @Abandoned_Dreams Abandoned Dreams
item.description:
@Abandoned_Dreams wrote:

[quote=“rova1, post:5, topic:378594”]on delta’s you use texthandler.java to write stuff there. If you want an action when clicking the text then you need to do that in clickingmost.java (or clicking.java)[/quote]Okay Dude, First I Was Looking Through TextHandler.java And It Has Nothing In It That Is In My Quest Tab…? WTF? Heres My TextHandler.java File.
http://pastebin.com/aR9Q9zTX
Please Help Me… This Is What I Need The Quest Tab To Look Like:

[code]Players Online: 56
Staff Status: Owner
Donor Status: Donor
Pk Points: 158

Help (Want To Click It And It Opens The Help Tab)
Rules (Want To Click It And It Opens The Rules Tab)
Donate (Want To Click It And It Opens The Donate Link)
Commands (Want To Click It And It Opens The Commands Tab)
Information (Want To Click It And It Opens The Information Tab)
[/code]
Please And Thank You.
PS. I Love Your Sig.

Read full topic

item.title: [DELTA, 317] Quest Tab [DELTA, 317]
item.dc:creator: @rova1 rova1
item.description:
@rova1 wrote:

on delta’s you use texthandler.java to write stuff there. If you want an action when clicking the text then you need to do that in clickingmost.java (or clicking.java)

Read full topic

item.title: [DELTA, 317] Quest Tab [DELTA, 317]
item.dc:creator: @Abandoned_Dreams Abandoned Dreams
item.description:
@Abandoned_Dreams wrote:

[quote=“RuneSpace, post:1, topic:378601”][quote author=Abandoned Dreams link=topic=474460.msg3469351#msg3469351 date=1295172099]

usually you can edit the quest tab by searching something that already is in the quest tab
[/quote]I Asked For The Files Because I Can’t Use My Search Bar… I Can’t Search For Anything Anymore… It Just Stoped Working IDK Why… Now… How Do I Edit Quest Tab, What It Says And Actions?

Dont fap over your computer tower, then it wont stop working. Simple fix[/quote]Can’t Just ‘Simple fix’ … Idk How… I Tryed Reseting Computer ETC. Just Won’t Allow Me To Use Search Bar Lol.

Read full topic
